means: 容许( tolerate的过去式和过去分词 )
容忍（不同意或不喜欢的事物）

sentence.Network_en: Political dissent would no longer be tolerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 政见不和将不再被容忍。

sentence.Network_en: She tolerated the teasing, until the fourth grade.
sentence.Network_cn: 她忍受着别人的嘲笑，一直忍到四年级。
伊丽莎白容忍了萨拉的搞怪。

PerfectNetExp.abs: All of the patients experienced local adverse reactions, but which were generally well tolerated.患者均有局部药物不良反应,可耐受。

list.abs: 攘字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 夺〖 snatch〗 容忍〖 tolerate〗 攘臂 rǎngb&#236.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... mention 说到，讲到 tolerate 忍受 dislike 不喜欢，讨厌.
形容人性格的词汇 ... tireless 孜孜不倦的 tolerant 容忍的 trustful 容易相信人的.
《宽容》(Tolerance)是一部描写人类思想发展史、畅销近百年的通俗历史读本,是关于宽容和自由思想的人文主义经典之作,由荷兰裔美 …
· 公差 (Tolerances) - 这些是与公差格式相关的参数。当尺寸由数字的转向符号的时候出项这些符号。

entry.def: If you tolerate a situation or person, you accept them although you do not particularly like them.

example.ex: She can no longer tolerate the position that she's in...
example.tran: 她再也受不了自己的处境了。

example.ex: The cousins tolerated each other, but did not really get on well together.
example.tran: 这对表亲互相容忍，但是相处得并不真正融洽。

entry.def: If you can tolerate something unpleasant or painful, you are able to bear it.

example.ex: The ability to tolerate pain varies from person to person.
example.tran: 对疼痛的忍受力因人而异。

auth_sentence.content: This kind of wastage isn't tolerated these days.
auth_sentence.res_content: This kind of wastage isn't tolerated these days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This kind of wastage isn't tolerated these days.

auth_sentence.content: For the most part, these sects were tolerated.
auth_sentence.res_content: For the most part, these sects were tolerated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For the most part, these sects were tolerated.

auth_sentence.content: It was the last great smog that London tolerated.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was the last great smog that London tolerated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was the last great smog that London tolerated.
